YouTube Android Player API
 
Package Index | Class Index
  • com.google.android.youtube.api

Select a package to view its members


Package Index | Class Index

Class Index

Y

Y

YouTube Static container class for all global namespace constants and library initialization. 
YouTubeBaseActivity Any activity that wants to directly incorporate YouTubePlayerView views in their UI must extend this activity. 
YouTubeIntents A selection of Intent creator convenience functions which enable navigation to specific Activities within the main YouTube application. 
YouTubePlayer This interface defines methods for loading and playing YouTube videos. 
YouTubePlayer.OnFullscreenListener Interface definition for a listener that is invoked when the player toggles between fullscreen on or off, either due to the user clicking the fullscreen button or a call to setFullscreen(boolean). 
YouTubePlayer.PlaybackEventListener Interface with definitions of callbacks invoked when video playback events occur. 
YouTubePlayer.PlayerStateChangeListener Interface with defintions for callbacks invoked when high level player state changes. 
YouTubePlayer.PlaylistEventListener Interface with definitions for callbacks invoked when events related to playlists occur. 
YouTubePlayerActivity An activity which will play the YouTube video or videos specified by the Intent used to start it. 
YouTubePlayerFragment A fragment which displays a YouTube Player View. 
YouTubePlayerSupportFragment A support library fragment which displays a YouTube Player View. 
YouTubePlayerView A view for displaying YouTube videos. 
YouTubeThumbnailView A view which can be used to display YouTube thumbnails, either for a specific YouTube video or a YouTube playlist. 
YouTubeThumbnailView.OnThumbnailLoadedListener Interface definition for a listener that is invoked when a thumbnail has been loaded.
